text:
Or bhayii...
I feel sad for my homeless brother.
Koi bndi ye pdhe toh plss iski gf bnn jaanaðŸ˜‚
Okay some good words now:
Ab almost 2 saal hogye...we started as smoking buddies and journey made us bros..he is part of my college life as one who can never disappoint u as friend...or jisse sb dark shit ptaa h....we had some great smoking shit memories and a "trippy trippy" Holi....(just to give u flashback)
Haan monthly ek bottle bhul mt jaana mc....see u soon man.
author: Deepak  Kumar

text:
Or bhai kya kissa...
Bhai jo kisse bnaye h na tune...mje hi aagye...great taste in music like meðŸ˜…...terko aasmaan ki uchaai me phuchane me jo mjee aaye h na vo kissi or ko phukane me nhi... capacity toh bhagwan ne dii h tujhe pkkka nshedi bnn skta h....
Kaafi mzee kiye yrr cllg me...bss tu abhi lst me nhi aaya...miss u bro
Seen u soon..!!
author: Deepak  Kumar

text:
